title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file and get an AI-powered analysis of what the data is about, including column meanings, data types, and overall purpose

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload interface with instant AI analysis and summary report

interactions: onFileDrop: parse CSV with Papa Parse and trigger AI analysis
onAnalyzeClick: call window.geaRuntimeLLM with parsed data for summary
storeLastAnalysis: save results to window.geaRuntimeStore for quick reload
acceptanceCriteria: Accepts CSV files of any shape/size without preset format
Parses CSV client-side and displays first 10 rows
Calls AI to generate concise summary of dataset purpose
Shows confidence score and key column interpretations
Handles parsing errors gracefully with user-friendly messages
Persists last analysis in local storage for session continuity
